solution_line_template: If Rachel and Leah have the same age, then the sum of their ages would be {sum_of_ages} - {age_difference} = <<{sum_of_ages}-{age_difference}={sum_if_same_age}>>{sum_if_same_age}.
So Leah would be {sum_if_same_age}/{number_of_people} = <<{sum_if_same_age}/{number_of_people}={leahs_age}>>{leahs_age} years old.
